trans-unit.source: This attribute can be applied to service operations to enable receive context behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以套用至服務作業，以啟用接收內容行為。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ReceiveContextEnabledAttribute.#ctor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ReceiveContextEnabledAttribute.#ctor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The operation description.
trans-unit.target: 作業描述。

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters.
trans-unit.target: 繫結參數。

trans-unit.source: Configures the binding elements to support the receive context behavior.
trans-unit.target: 設定繫結項目以支援接收內容行為。

trans-unit.source: The operation description.
trans-unit.target: 作業描述。

trans-unit.source: The client run-time object.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端執行階段物件。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The operation description.
trans-unit.target: 作業描述。

trans-unit.source: The operation to dispatch to.
trans-unit.target: 要分派的作業。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription,System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets value that indicates whether the receive acknowledgement for this operation is explicitly signaled by service method.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示服務方法是否明確發出此作業的接收確認。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the receive acknowledgement for this operation is explicitly signaled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此作業的接收確認已明確發出，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReceiveContextEnabledAttribute.ManualControl%2A> property is set to `true`, the message received from the channel is delivered to the service operation with a lock for the message in the form of "ReceiveContext message property".
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.ServiceModel.ReceiveContextEnabledAttribute.ManualControl%2A>屬性設定為`true`，從通道收到的訊息會傳遞給服務作業與鎖定訊息的 「 ReceiveContext 訊息屬性 」 形式。

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the service implementation to either to call <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.Complete%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.Abandon%2A> to signal the receive completion of the message.
trans-unit.target: 服務實作會負責呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.Complete%2A> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.Abandon%2A>，以示意訊息接收完成。

trans-unit.source: Failure to call either of these result in the lock being held on the message until the lock timeout interval elapses.
trans-unit.target: 若是未能呼叫其中任何一項，就會導致鎖定保留在訊息上，直到鎖定逾時的期限結束。

trans-unit.source: Once the lock is released (either through calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.Abandon%2A> or lock timeout) the message is re-dispatched from the channel to the service.
trans-unit.target: 一旦鎖定釋放 (可能是透過呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.Abandon%2A> 或由於鎖定逾時)，訊息就會從通道再次分派到服務。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.Complete%2A> marks the message as successfully received.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.Complete%2A> 就表示已成功接收訊息。

trans-unit.source: The operation description.
trans-unit.target: 作業描述。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior.Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription)" /> 方法。
